fixes.name: proj bal2
fixes.dax_expression:
IF(
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Maturity Date] > 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[date series]
    && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Start date] <= 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[date series]
    && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Source] <> "EUROCLEAR"
    && 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[R/Rr (non repos)] = "Repo"
    && INT('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Is Internal ?]) <> 1,
    'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T],
    0
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau IF to a DAX IF, transformed all field references to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Column], used && for logical AND, kept string literals in double quotes, and retained INT() and the return values (Initial Cash USD T or 0).
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references calculated fields (e.g., [date series] which depends on [fixed DTM]) that include a LOD ({ FIXED ... }) in their definition, indicating aggregate/context-based logic; therefore it must be implemented as a measure.
